mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE (TITLE, START_DATETIME, END_DATETIME, COLOR, MEMO, LOCATION, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, USER_ID) VALUES (#{title}, #{startDateTime}, #{endDateTime}, #{color}, #{memo}, #{location}, #{latitude},#{longitude},#{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT s.ID AS scheduleId, s.TITLE AS title, s.START_DATETIME AS startDateTime, s.END_DATETIME AS endDateTime, s.COLOR AS color, s.LOCATION AS location, s.LATITUDE AS latitude, s.LONGITUDE AS longitude, s.MEMO AS memo, u.ID AS participantId, u.NAME AS participantName, up.PARTICIPANT_NAME AS unregisteredParticipantName FROM SCHEDULE s LEFT JOIN SCHEDULE_PARTICIPANT sp ON s.ID = sp.SCHEDULE_ID LEFT JOIN USER u ON sp.USER_ID = u.ID LEFT JOIN UNREGISTERED_PARTICIPANT up ON s.ID = up.SCHEDULE_ID WHERE s.ID = #{scheduleId}
